titleStmt.title: The inheritance of the saints in light set forth in a sermon preach'd at Whitehall, August 11, 1700 / by Ab. Campion ...
titleStmt.author: Campion, Abraham, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Leake for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon preach'd at Whitehall, before the Lords justices.

Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
